import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import { Pagination } from "swiper"; import { Tab } from '@headlessui/react' import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import 'swiper/css'; import 'swiper/css/pagination'; import logo from '../img/logo.png' import slider1 from '../img/slider1.jpg' import slider2 from '../img/slider2.jpg' import slider3 from '../img/slider3.jpg' import { ClassNames } from '@emotion/react'; const Header = () => { return (
{/* tab */} isActive ? 'font-semibold text-sm tracking-tighter px-3 py-2 rounded-md bg-primary_color' : 'font-semibold text-sm tracking-tighter px-3 py-2 rounded-md hover:text-primary_color duration-300' } > TRANG CHỦ PHỤ KIỆN GIỚI THIỆU LIÊN HỆ {/* swipper */} {/* search */}
) } export default Header
